exception tau.commands.AmbiguousCommandError(value, matches, hint="Try 'tau --help'.")[source]¶

Bases: error.ConfigurationError

Indicates that a specified partial command is ambiguous

message_fmt = '\nCommand %(value)r is ambiguous: %(matches)r\n\n%(hint)s'¶
exception tau.commands.UnknownCommandError(value, hint="Try 'tau --help'.")[source]¶

Bases: error.ConfigurationError

Indicates that a specified command is unknown

message_fmt = '\n%(value)r is not a valid TAU command.\n\n%(hint)s'¶
tau.commands.executeCommand(cmd, cmd_args=[])[source]¶

Import the command module and run its main routine
